name: Improve LSP Error Messages
details: Enhance error reporting for LSP connection failures to provide more helpful diagnostic information when servers fail to start or connect.

tasks.name: Analyze Current Error Handling
tasks.details: Review how LSP connection errors are currently handled in language-client.ts

tasks.name: Add Server Validation
tasks.details: Before attempting LSP connection, validate that the server executable exists and is accessible

tasks.name: Improve Connection Error Messages
tasks.details: Replace generic 'LSP connection closed' with specific error context about what failed and why

tasks.name: Add Diagnostic Information
tasks.details: When LSP fails, provide diagnostic info like server command, working directory, stderr output

tasks.name: Test Error Scenarios
tasks.details: Test improved error messages with various failure scenarios (missing server, permission issues, etc)
